titles.title: A bill for the relief of Dynamic Technology International, Inc., Lew Malank Associates, Star Design, Inc., Riverside Precision Machines, and certain other individuals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 1/20/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a sum to be determined to certain organizations and individuals in full satisfaction of their claims against the United States for damages resulting from certain actions of U.S. agents, officers, and employees committed prior to, during, and after various contract investigations.
